3622a41ecab90c95eb8c048af511f02299e31d04.query:
UPDATE xp
        SET
            level = $1,
            progress = $2
        WHERE
            id = $3

be791dd2873aaff294b705a78798c5f15668e1de.query:
INSERT INTO xp
            (id, last_update)
        VALUES
            ($1, $3)
        ON CONFLICT
            (id)
        DO UPDATE
        SET
            progress = xp.progress + $2,
            last_update = $3
        WHERE
            xp.last_update < $3 - 300
        RETURNING
            progress, level, last_update
